subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that the Javadoc block comment end */ position is either alone on its own line or on the same line as the block comment begin code /**.
subsection.p: It is possible to enforce two different strategies:

ul.li:
alone - The block comment end must be alone on its own line. This allows only multi-line Javadoc comments:
/** * Multiple lines of Javadoc text are written here, * wrapped normally... */ public void method();

tr.td: Specify the policy on strategy of the block comment end position.
